definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Pine lumber with many knots; used especially for paneling and furniture.
sentences.chinese: 带许多节疤的松木，尤其用作镶板和制家具。

sentences.english: The most common reasons for decreasing quality grade were rot and knots.
sentences.chinese: 质量等级降低最通常的原意就是腐烂和节疤。

sentences.english: The knight knocked the knave on his knuckles with a knotted knob.
sentences.chinese: 武士用多节疤棍棒的头敲打恶棍的指关节。

definition: sapwood (between vascular cambium and pith inside growing wood)
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
branches and tendrils/fig. overcomplicated or digressive
